getBrightColor(int).Description: Computes a default brighter version of the given color.

Parameters: int: The main search orb color.
SearchOrbView.Colors(int).Description: Constructs a color set using the given color for the search orb. Other colors are provided by the framework.

Parameters: int: The main search orb color.
int: A brighter version of the search orb used for animation.
int: A color used to tint the search orb icon.
